endings.Title: The Media Manipulator
endings.Description: You've masterfully controlled the narrative by suppressing negative stories and promoting favorable coverage. The media has become your propaganda machine, with critical voices silenced or discredited.

endings.Title: The Popular Tyrant
endings.Description: The public adores you while institutions crumble. Your populist policies have won hearts but undermined the foundations of governance.

endings.Title: The Technocratic Overlord
endings.Description: You've optimized the system through cold, calculated efficiency. The trains run on time, but the people resent your clinical, emotionless governance.

endings.Title: The Perfect Balance
endings.Description: Against all odds, you've navigated the ridiculous landscape of politics with wisdom and foresight, managing to please both the people and institutions.

endings.Title: Total System Collapse
endings.Description: Your buffoonish leadership has managed to antagonize everyone while destroying the very fabric of governance.

endings.Title: The Truth-Teller
endings.Description: Despite all pressures, you've maintained journalistic integrity, exposing corruption while providing factual reporting.

endings.Title: The Propaganda Machine
endings.Description: You've mastered the art of deception, wrapping falsehoods in just enough truth to maintain credibility while pushing your agenda.

endings.Title: The Satirical Legend
endings.Description: You've elevated political satire to an art form, using humor to expose truths that straight reporting cannot.

endings.Title: Media Martyrdom
endings.Description: Despite your commitment to factual reporting, powerful interests have successfully discredited your work. You're respected by historians but ignored by the public.

endings.Title: Yellow Journalism Empire
endings.Description: Sensationalism sells! Your outrageous headlines and manufactured controversies have built a media empire, facts be damned.
